title: Story Form
desc: This settings will affect the story form on EasySocial

fields.label: Allow Creating Blogs
fields.tooltip: This option determines if users should be able to create a new blog post on the site using the story form.
fields.name: blog_form

title: Stream Settings
desc: This settings will only be affected when you set this app as the default application for users on the site. Configure the default application settings for this app here.

fields.label: Content lengths to display in stream
fields.tooltip: Specify the content lengths when display the blog content in stream. Set 0 to ignore this setting and follow the default easyblog truncation settings.
fields.name: maxlength

fields.label: Content truncation type
fields.tooltip: Specify which method to count the content lenghts
fields.name: truncation

fields.label: Image alignment
fields.tooltip: Specify if blog image should display on the left or right.
fields.name: imagealignment

title: Profile Settings
desc: This settings will only be affected when you set this app as the default application for users on the site. Configure the default application settings for this app here.

fields.label: Total blog posts to display
fields.tooltip: Specify the number of feed items to display in the profile
fields.name: total

fields.label: Content length to display in profile view (By Characters)
fields.tooltip: Specify the content lengths when display the blog content in profile view. Set 0 to ignore this setting and follow the default easyblog truncation settings.
fields.name: profile_maxlength
